=pod

=head1 NAME

stterm - simple terminal implementation for X

=head1 SYNOPSIS

  stterm [option]

=head1 DESCRIPTION

An extremely simple terminal for windowed system.

=head1 OPTIONS

=over 4

=item B<-V, --version>

Display version information.

=back

=head1 ENVIRONMENT

None.

=head1 FILES

None.

=head1 SEE ALSO

page(1)

<http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html>.

=cut
